itemDescription: English-Canadian actor, politician and tour guide (born 1950)

wikipedia_page.main: Philip James Craig (born September 3, 1950) is an English-born Canadian actor, former politician and battlefield tour guide. His film credits include Cinderella Man (2005) and The Time Traveler's Wife (2009).
